ai-thag12.1:1.1_0: One should train just in ethical conduct,
ai-thag12.1:2.1_0: Wishing for three kinds of happiness—
ai-thag12.1:2.3_0: and to delight in heaven after passing away—
ai-thag12.1:2.4_0: they depart to rejoice in heaven.
ai-thag12.1:3.3_0: But one lacking ethics, of bad conduct,
ai-thag12.1:4.1_0: A person whose ethics are bad has
ai-thag12.1:4.3_0: A person whose conduct is ethical always has
ai-thag12.1:4.4_0: a good reputation, fame, and praise.
ai-thag12.1:5.1_0: Ethical conduct is the starting point and foundation;
ai-thag12.1:5.4_0: that’s why you should purify your ethics.
ai-thag12.1:6.1_0: Ethics provide a boundary and a restraint,
ai-thag12.1:6.3_0: the ford where all the Buddhas cross over:
ai-thag12.1:6.4_0: that’s why you should purify your ethics.
ai-thag12.1:7.4_0: An ethical person’s virtue is fitting.
ai-thag12.1:8.4_0: that float from place to place.
ai-thag12.1:9.2_0: ethics are the unsurpassed supply for a journey;
ai-thag12.1:9.4_0: that flew from place to place.
ai-thag12.1:10.2_0: after departing they grieve in a lower realm;
ai-thag12.1:11.2_0: after departing they’re happy in heaven;
ai-thag12.1:11.3_0: a wise one is happy everywhere,
ai-thag12.1:11.4_0: and you are steady in ethics,
ai-thag12.1:12.1_0: Ethical conduct is best in this life,
ai-thag12.1:12.2_0: but one with wisdom is supreme.
